title: Quality Analysis Project for Educational Video Repository

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Statistical Analysis Concepts
context.additional_context: Learners analyze educational video repository data using personal devices and conduct projects to derive video quality metrics in language learning

learning_goals: Explain content growth patterns by analyzing the structural characteristics of an educational video repository.
Quantitatively evaluate quality metrics based on video length, reuse frequency, and user interaction data.
Design a model to predict educational effectiveness through quality analysis of language-learning videos.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
